name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceDynamicMesh
doc: Data Interface that can create mesh geometry at runtime from triangle data (e.g. to render a custom generated mesh per particle)

Sections:
Sections to render, each section will generally result in a draw call.
Triangles are contiguous between sections, i.e. Section[1] triangles will begin after Section[0].NumTriangles
NumVertices: Allocates space for the number of vertices we will use, leave as zero if you intend to allocate dynamically via VM calls.
NumTexCoords: Allocates space for the number of texture coordinates requested.
bHasColors: Allocates space for vertex colors when enabled.
bHasTangentBasis: Allocates space for tangent basis when enabled.
bClearTrianglesPerFrame: Should we auto clear section triangle allocations per frame or not.
DefaultBounds: Should we auto clear section triangle allocations per frame or not.
